Title: Dewalt DCE088D1R 12v Cross Line Laser Level Red Self Levelling Tstak 1x2ah +3ah
Description:
The DeWalt DCE088D1R Self-Levelling Cross Line Red Beam Laser is a multi-voltage XR power tool, compatible with 12v Li-ion batteries. A green beam laser diode provides full brightness for visibility and extended working range. It has a variable blink sequence for manual mode and full-time pulse mode allows use with a detector. Fitted with a fine adjustment knob for precision and accuracy. There is also a locking pendulum to help prevent damage to internal components.

Features

Fine adjustment knob for precision and accuracy
Red beam laser diode provides full brightness for visibility and extended working range
Variable blink sequence for manual mode
Full time pulse mode allows use with detector
Locking Pendulum to help prevent damage to internal components
Battery indicator
Self-levelling cross line laser
Suitable for indoor and outdoor use

Includes

1x DCE088D1R Red Multi-Laser
1x 12v 2.0Ah XR Batteries
1x DCB107 Charger 
1x Laser Target
1x Safety Glasses (Pair)
1x Wall Mount Bracket
1x TSTAK Carry Case
 
Plus Extra 1x 12v 3.0Ah XR Battery
